name: Equality
overview: Originally released in 1991, improved and updated in 1992, vastly modified and finished for wide release in 2003. You must find the balance between the two sides. Each object has its own mass: – The green ball weighs 1 Kg. – The yellow ring weighs 2 Kg, it crushes the green ball. – The blue triangle weighs 3 Kg and crushes yellow and green objects. – The brown diamond weighs 4 Kg and crushes blue, yellow and green objects. – The red pentagon weighs 5 Kg and it crushes all other objects when it falls. – The gray square has no mass The value of the next weight is displayed on the side of the central bar. The balance of the plateaus is visualized by a progress bar.
